attributes.action: To prevent mr mckinnon being sent to the USA by force.so he can be tried and jailed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr mckinnon has a mental abnormality,even his actions in regards with interfearing with the USA militery computer systems.It is a clear sign of his abnormality.He should be dealt with in the UK.

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions about individual legal cases. The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
